mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIS_REG ( USER_ID, BIS_DIV, BIS_NUM, BIS_TYPE_L, BIS_TYPE_M, BIS_NAME, CEO_NAME, OPEN_DATE, ADDRESS ) VALUES ( #{USER_ID}, #{BIS_DIV}, #{BIS_NUM}, #{BIS_TYPE_L}, #{BIS_TYPE_M}, #{BIS_NAME}, #{CEO_NAME}, #{OPEN_DATE}, #{ADDRESS} )

INSERT INTO BIS_STORE ( USER_ID, BIS_DIV, BIS_NUM, BIS_TYPE_L, BIS_TYPE_M, BIS_NAME, CEO_NAME, OPEN_DATE, ADDRESS, STORE_PHONENUM, OPEN_TIME ) VALUES ( #{USER_ID}, #{BIS_DIV}, #{BIS_NUM}, #{BIS_TYPE_L}, #{BIS_TYPE_M}, #{BIS_NAME}, #{CEO_NAME}, #{OPEN_DATE}, #{ADDRESS}, #{STORE_PHONENUM}, #{OPEN_TIME} )
